titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before His Maiestie at Whitehall, on Easter day last. 1618. By the Bishop of Elie, His Maiesties almoner
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.

notesStmt.note: Initial leaf contains large signature-mark "A" with part of a woodcut frame.
Signatures Aa and Bb are in one of two settings. P. 1, line 6 ends: (1) "should" or (2) "hap-"; p. 7, line 8 ends (1) "Hoc" or (2) "plaine".
Also issued as part 3 of the collection of sermons without general title page (STC 624.5) commencing with "The copie of the sermon preached on Good-Friday before the Kings Maiestie".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
